thread.section_title: NiceBadge Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NiceBadge | nicebadge.com
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text:
NiceBadge offers great customer service--quick response and correct answers to questions. The product was easy to order--the navigation between the first design and the approved design was a little clunky.
Shipping is a bit slow--probably not justifiably put on this company.
What matters most is that the product arrived carefully packed, exactly as ordered, exactly the high quality I expected, and on time. I wore it on the day of arrival--lots of positive comments from associates and clients.
